title: Widefoot’s New Cargocage
content:
First introduced in 2019, the CargoMount revolutionized the cargo cage market with its single-piece aluminum construction. The innovative, low-profile design allowed riders to keep the cage mounted on their frame or forks without adding unnecessary bulk. The latest iteration of the CargoMount enhances this concept by incorporating an internally threaded tube, dubbed the CargoNoodle, to provide a stronger, removable support…

Use your Noodle

The CargoNoodle is a threaded aluminum tube, bent into a macaroni-like shape, that serves as the load-bearing support for the cargo cage. Fastened to the CargoMount using standard m5 stainless steel hardware, this design offers superior strength compared to its predecessor and its tubular design blends well aesthetically with other cycling components.

New CargoMount Sizes

The updated CargoMount will be available in two sizes:

  • Regular: Similar in dimensions and design to the original CargoMount, the Regular size weighs just 78g, including the CargoNoodle.
  • Mega: Featuring an additional set of mounting slots spaced at the standard 64mm distance, the Mega offers increased length for taller cargo. Other than the added length, it shares dimensions with the Regular size, and utilizes the same CargoNoodle support, weighing 98g in total.

Both sizes will be available in black, silver, orange, and purple anodized finishes.

The Little Sibling: MiniMount

The MiniMount is a compact cargo cage with a profile similar to the CargoMount, without the base. Add bolts and a strap and it’s perfect for carrying small items like tools, tubes, and bottles. The lightest of the lineup, it weighs just 32g. It will also be available in black, silver, orange, and purple anodized finishes.

The CargoMount Classic

Fans of the original CargoMount design can rest assured that the original version will remain available, now rebranded as the CargoMount Classic.

Pricing (Without Straps)

CargoMount Regular: $48-$51
CargoMount Mega: $56-$59
MiniMount: $30-$32
